frontmatter.question: I am a cultural heritage professional and would like to add interesting content to the Hub. How can I do that?
frontmatter.answer: If you want to add content to the hub, please do so via the forms we provided. With this forms you can either show case your institution, promote an upcoming event or write a blogentry on a certain theme. Please keep in mind - especially when promoting an event -  that it will take some time before your submitted content will be reviewed and published.
